amendment.description: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 10, as amendment No. 34, that reduces the appropriation for energy supply, research and development activities by $211 million and increases the Nuclear Waste Disposal Fund and Nuclear Regulatory Commission by $200 million and $11 million, respectively.

action.text: Mr. Myers raised a point of order against the Markey amendment (A018). Mr. Myers stated that the amendment allocates funds for unauthorized projects and therefore violates clause 2 of rule 21. The Chair sustained the point of order.
